title: Got a mystery gift by Riot but It didn't show which skin I got. How do I check?
body: I believe I got a mystery gift by Riot as a compensation for prior owning Riot Kayle but it didn't show which skin I got.

replies.body: As the gifts are rolling out to every account, some players my not get a toast notification per our current [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-).  Looking into this for you, so far you've only gained the icon.  You may not get everything all at once until this is all finished, but you may see the mystery gift through your purchase history.  Hang tight!
Yeah, I'm in the same boat. I also own _Rito Kayle_ but **haven't** received a mystery gift. Where should I look for it?
